narrative.narrative: Direct Fly was a short lived Polish airline that started operations on April 12,2006 and ended on May 7,2007. Its base was Warsaw Chopin with other bases at Wroclaw,Gdansk and Krakow. It did domestic service besides its first two months. After two months in operation is cancelled international operations to Copenhagen,Denmark Berlin,Germany Kiev,Ukraine and Lviv,Ukraine. It used two Saab 340's. In its ashes SprintAir was formed in May 2008. SprintAir does a passenger route between Warsaw and Zielona Gora and does cargo to 9 domestic airports and 3 international as of 2013. It also had 18 planes at June 2013. Fifteen Saab 340's,a Let 410 and two Diamond Katana's.
